title.narrative: Strengthening U.S. Leadership on Global Food and Nutrition Security

description.narrative: U.S. leadership for global food and nutrition programming has increased in recent years as evidenced by the elevation of the Feed the Future program as one of the signature global development initiatives of President Obama. Building on this momentum and emerging opportunities to further enhance global food and nutrition programming, InterAction seeks to broaden and strengthen key stakeholder awareness and engagement in agriculture-focused investment initiatives. Through a comprehensive and integrated approach, the project will broaden and better align key stakeholders for greater impact. This approach leverages the influence and collective engagement of a variety of multi-sector stakeholders to increase awareness, promote intelligent discussion, and increase public exposure to advance the global food and nutrition agenda. This strategy includes the flexibility needed to effectively adapt to unexpected challenges and leverage opportunities with the greatest potential to increase U.S. leadership.
Note: We publish the award notification date as the transaction date. If this data is missing, the transaction date defaults to the start date of the activity
